Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement District -- 10.40 Mills Continuation - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to be authorized to levy and collect up to ten and forty hundredths (10.40) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District, said mills to represent a 0.22 mills increase over the 10.18 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2019 and which is currently being levied at 9.92 mills, pursuant to an election held on November 4, 2008 (an estimated $608,304.93 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District, said tax being a continuation of an existing tax which will expire in 2019?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Public Roads and Bridges) -- 8.63 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy an eight and sixty-three hundredths (8.63) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $655,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of maintenance and/or construction of public roads and bridges in the Parish?
